name: Leek Spiniator
description:
The first game I released!

A side-scroll shooter. You play as a leek that can shoot and use melee attacks. Also contains a boss fight. Around 10 minutes of gameplay.

Made for the I can't draw but want to make a game (again) jam 2020.

So don't expect too much.

Maybe I continue working on this project with better tilesets and improved mechanics.
